entry.title: Make Some Noise
entry.summary:
Author: grellsutcliffno1fan

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 2,763Chapters: 1/16Kudos: 2

Summary: Metropolis pretends to be perfect — glass spires, spotless streets — but Clark Kent knows better. When being Superman gets too loud, he disappears behind the buzz of a punk stage. Then Batman arrives, chasing a stolen WayneTech prototype, and crashes headfirst into the city’s electric underground… and into the orbit of a technicolour hero who hits all the wrong — or maybe all the right — chords in his chest. Or: Superbats, but Clark is in a punk band.

entry.title: Into the sky
entry.summary:
Author: queenseptienna

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 24,587Chapters: 5/5Kudos: 11

Summary: A.R.G.U.S. sends Peacemaker and Vigilante to Metropolis for a “simple diplomatic collaboration” with the Justice Gang.Translation: Amanda Waller wants them to pretend they’re professional, hide the fact that they’re dating, and not embarrass her in front of Superman, Batman, and the new roster of shiny competent heroes.It goes badly immediately.Superman is too nice, Batman hates them on sight, and Metropolis is being destabilized by alien tech that Peacemaker definitely should not be touching.Vigilante accidentally impresses Batman.Peacemaker gets jealous of literally everyone.The Justice Gang witnesses the world’s most accidental double date.When a dimensional rift tears open over the city, the four heroes are forced to work together — with varying success, a lot of yelling, and one moment of unexpected brilliance from Vigilante that even Batman has to respect.Chaos, jealousy, teamwork, accidental domesticity, two couples figuring themselves out, and one exhausted Kryptonian trying not to hear Peacemaker and Vigilante having sex through the safehouse walls.

entry.title: The Thought of You
entry.summary:
Author: even_atlas

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 6,387Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 13

Summary: “And I feel…I dunno. Lighter,” Kal says, introspective as he drags a fry repeatedly through the drips of ketchup on his plate. “Everything feels easier when there’s something to live for. I like my life. That’s not something I thought I’d ever experience again.” Bruce has finished his food. Kal looks down at his half-finished burger and picks it up, pushing the plate of fries toward the center of the table where they can both reach them. “Things aren’t so bad when you’ve got people who love you,” Bruce says, agreeing. “Doesn’t mean things aren’t hard, though. Some things just suck.”

entry.summary:
Author: Concerned_Citizen

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 1,664Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 4

Summary: The next time Clark heard Bruce head to the bathroom he hid in the stall beside it, he wanted to hear it without the super hearing. He heard Bruce enter the stall and close the door behind him, his pants being unzipped and pulled down, and then it began. Clark grabbed at his crotch when Bruce started pissing and came shortly after. But Bruce wasn't done. Clark started to clean himself up when he heard Bruce suck in a breath, Clark paused. Then came an unmistakable bubbling fart, crackling sounds, a grunt, and finally a splash. Clark was listening to Bruce shit. entry.title: Arisen The Bat
entry.summary:
Author: dexpair

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 2,779Chapters: 2/71Kudos: 2

Summary: On the streets of a Neo Gotham, old man Bruce Wayne lived his life as quite as possible. No more hero stuff, no more meetings with The League in space. His days were filled with silly conversations with his husband or listening to the dramas of his teenage son. It was an opposite reality to the one he had lived his whole life, but that's what made it special for him. However, on a special day, Bruce discovers that getting rid of his past life wouldn't be so easy. Ghosts from the past have returned, this time haunting his children, and The Dark Knight realizes he will have to act for his city and his family one last time.
